timedatectl

Summary

Control system time and date details on Linux

Jots

recurring issue on Linux reinstalls: reboot into Microsoft Windows and the time is off by my local offset from UTC. Fix that in Linux by telling the system the Real Time Clock (RTC) uses local time

timedatectl set-local-rtc 1 --adjust-system-clock
